title: Char Siu Ketchup Recipe
full_text:
Char Siu Ketchup Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
2 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
6 servings
Makes
3/4 cup
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1/2
cup
ketchup
3
tablespoons
hoisin sauce
2
tablespoons
honey
1
tablespoon
soy sauce
1
teaspoon
dry sherry
1/2
teaspoon
five-spice powder
Directions
Whisk together together ketchup, hoisin, honey, soy sauce, sherry, and five spice powder in a small bowl. Use immediately or transfer to an airtight container and store in refrigerator for up to a month.
